name: Cactus Run (EvaLecocq)
description:
Game made during a game jam.

Game jam theme: bug

Inspired by the google game : T-rex Run. Your pc is infected with bugs and viruses, the goal : close all pop-ups before your CPU crashes your computer.

Cactus Run is an arcade game, where you have to be the fastest to beat your record!

Team : Armand Gémeux / Joris Gonzales  / Antoine Mulliez   / Eva Lecocq
